Description:
A range of key housing information and summary tables for Scotland and local authority area.
Table 1-Estimated stock of dwellings by tenure - calendar year time series from 1993 to 2000 and financial year time series from 2001-02 to 2016-17, at Scotland level.
Table 2-Estimated stock of dwellings by tenure and local authority, most recent year only.
Name: Housing Statistics for Scotland - Key Information and Summary Tables
Notes:
Information from Housing Statistics Annual Returns, and Scottish Household Survey data.
Note the change in methodology from 2001, fully explained in the notes in the downloadable excel file.
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified under heading "Downloadable document:" towards bottom of page.
Sizing Notes: Simple table structure and dimensions to extract.  A bit of messiness from Number / percentage and from footnote markers
